intent_atoms.description: Finalize the edts/elst parser scope by reviewing ISO/IEC 14496-12 §8.6 and confirming field widths, fixed‑point rate handling, and how edit list segment counts relate to mvhd/tkhd durations.
Scope documented in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/120_C14a_Finalize_Edit_List_Scope/C14a_Finalize_Edit_List_Scope.md to unblock parser, validation, and fixture follow‑ups.
Implement elst entry parsing within BoxParserRegistry, capturing segment duration, media time, and rate while normalizing rate to double precision for UI/export consumers.
Ensure large edit lists stream without over‑allocation.
Parse pipeline now threads mvhd/mdhd timescales into the edit list environment.
Wire edit list payloads into validation so reconciled presentation durations align with movie/track headers and flag gaps or overlaps.
Extend existing duration diagnostics to reference edit list context.

Refresh fixtures, JSON exports, and snapshot baselines covering common edit list scenarios (empty list, single offset, multi‑segment, rate adjustments) and document test execution notes in the new task summary.
Implement baseline metadata box coverage for udta, meta (handler), keys, and ilst atoms, surfacing simple string/integer payloads for CLI export.
Follow archival context in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/96_C5_hdlr_Handler_Parser/Summary_of_Work.md to keep handler mappings consistent.
Validation Rule #15 correlates stsc chunk runs, stsz/stz2 sample sizes, and stco/co64 offsets to flag mismatches alongside the new sync sample metadata.

functional_units.name: Edit List Parser
functional_units.description: Parses 'elst' box entries capturing segment duration, media time, and rate, normalizing rate to double precision.

functional_units.name: Edit List Validation Integration
functional_units.description: Validates edit list payloads against movie/track headers, flagging gaps or overlaps and extending duration diagnostics.

functional_units.name: Edit List Fixture Refresh
functional_units.description: Refreshes fixtures, JSON exports, and snapshot baselines for common edit list scenarios.

functional_units.name: Metadata Box Parser Coverage
functional_units.description: Parses 'udta', 'meta' (handler), 'keys', and 'ilst' atoms to surface simple string/integer payloads for CLI export.

functional_units.name: Chunk Run Validation Rule #15
functional_units.description: Correlates stsc, stsz/stz2 sample sizes, and stco/co64 offsets to flag mismatches with sync sample metadata.
